definition: the Divine Pivot or Spiritual Pivot, ancient Chinese medical text

sentences.english: Peripheral neuropathy also occurs with demyelization and degeneration of the axis cylinder .
sentences.chinese: 隨着骨髓的樞椎管的再生作用也產生末梢神經病。

sentences.english: An analeptic drug stimulates the central nervous system .
sentences.chinese: 興奮劑刺激樞神經系統。

sentences.english: The third chapter mainly studies the essence and significance of Xianyu Shu's Rejuvenation style.
sentences.chinese: 第三章重點研究了鮮于樞“復古”的實質與意義。

sentences.english: Xianyu Shu is an outstanding calligrapher of the early Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 鮮于樞，元代初期著名的書法家。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss appropriate strategy about treatment of rotatory fixation or dislocation of atlantoaxial articulation in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒寰樞關節旋轉固定或脫位的治療方法。

sentences.english: Proposing the concept of Axis meridians, and the debate of the name "Axis Shao-yin" or "Axis Jue-yin" .
sentences.chinese: 樞經概念的提出，及少陰樞與厥陰樞之爭。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of ondansetron induced mutation.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察樞復寧的誘變作用。

sentences.english: The 3D kinematics in the atlanto-occipital and atlantoaxial joints were evaluated using the volume merge method.
sentences.chinese: 的方法來評價寰枕關節和寰樞關節的三維動力學特點。
